about_the_game:
Mimic Hunters - is a game in which you have to become an mimic or a hunter.
An exciting game for a company of friends and new acquaintances.
Mimics disguise themselves as objects around the map and move with the environment. Try to hide from the hunters and find out. Hunters win if all mimics are killed, and mimics win if time runs out or all hunters die.

If you are Mimic: you must hide from the hunters. To do this, take the form of any item that is found on the map.

If you are a Hunter: You should seek out and kill mimics. For this you have a magic. But hurry - you have limited time!


Hunter

•At the beginning of the round, hunters cannot move for a certain amount of time.

•Use all methods of magic to reveal your goal.

•Find the player who is disguised as an mimic.

•Each mistake will cost dearly. Choose wisely!

Mimic

•Players can turn into almost any object on the map.

•Depending on the size, objects take over the health and speed of the object of transformation: large objects are more difficult to destroy than, say, breaking a small bottle, but escaping in this form will be somewhat difficult.

•Run, hide, disguise yourself. Do everything so that the hunter does not find you.

•The cost of your mistake is life.

name: Mimic Hunters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN 10
  • Processor: I5 2500
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD7950 \ GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN 10
  • Processor: I7 2700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX570 \ GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX9
